com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector.features

Class SentenceDetectorFeatureParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.AbstractFeatureParser<PossibleSentenceBoundary>
      • com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector.features.SentenceDetectorFeatureParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureClassContainer, FeatureParser<PossibleSentenceBoundary>, FeatureParserInternal<PossibleSentenceBoundary>

    public class SentenceDetectorFeatureParser
extends AbstractFeatureParser<PossibleSentenceBoundary>
    A parser for sentence detector descriptors.
    The list of available features is given in addFeatureClasses(FeatureClassContainer).
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

      void addFeatureClasses(FeatureClassContainer container)

        - Initials: InitialsFeature

      • getModifiedDescriptors

        public java.util.List<FunctionDescriptor> getModifiedDescriptors(FunctionDescriptor functionDescriptor)
        Description copied from class: AbstractFeatureParser
        Given a feature descriptor, converts it into multiple feature descriptors if required, for example when generating a separate feature for each pos-tag, or for an whole range of indexes. Should return a List containing the initial function descriptor if no modification is required.
        Specified by:
        getModifiedDescriptors in class AbstractFeatureParser<PossibleSentenceBoundary>
